name: Club pepe
description:
Club pepe is an interactive multiplayer social game in early access.

 Since it is in early access every 1-2 days there will be an updated client.

offical discord: https://discord.gg/bftg2YT

controls:

 w,a,s,d - movement

Shift - Sprint

tab - weather

enter - for chat

ctrl + T - to play tag

esc - pause menu
